last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 20
last_episode_to_air.overview: When their van breaks down, Cheng No, Tian-qing and the dance troupe race against the clock to arrive at the festival in time.

name: A Thousand Goodnights
overview: To carry out her dad's wish and discover her roots, Dai Tian-qing embarks on a journey around Taiwan and finds love and redemption on the way.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Train station chief Dai Jia-he encounters a young girl abandoned at the platform and takes her under his wing.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Dai Tian-qing bonds with Cheng No over the unexpected tragedy and decides to complete the journey.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Cheng No accompanies Tian-qing as she sets out in search of the woman captured in a photo found tucked inside a notebook.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Liu Xiu-zhen tells Tian-qing about her past with Dai Jia-he. Cheng No finds himself at odds with his parents over his career plans.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Xiu-zhen reminisces about the day her romance ended. Tian-qing visits her father's old friend to ask about a cooking recipe that was left behind.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Wu Bo-sen's dad grows concerned about his son's decision to join a music contest. Tian-yu and Tian-qing try to reach out to their father's old friend.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Jia-he's photo of the Mikado pheasant sheds light on a past misunderstanding with Mr. Hsin. Cheng No is troubled by his parents' fraught relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Mrs. Hsin tells her husband about how Dai Jia-he saved her life. The three families find reconciliation and honor in Jia-he's memory.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Tian-qing, Tian-yu and Cheng No help Xiao-jian reunite with his mom. Cheng No's dad clears up the confusion over the young woman at his office.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Tian-qing tours Tainan, Wu Bo-sen loses hope over the contest, and Cheng No's half sister asks him to put their parents' pasts behind them.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Jason confronts Tian-qing about a debt, Cheng No comes across an unexpected figure from his dad's past and Wu Bo-sen tells Tian-qing his secret.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Tian-qing reconciles with her colleague over the stolen illustrations. Cheng No assists Zuoteng Gang in the search for his biological father.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Ah Gang learns that his mother once asked Jia-he for a favor, Cheng No meets his dad's former mistress and Jason takes a hit for his father's debt.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Wu Bo-sen confronts a dilemma ahead of his trip overseas. As Tian-qing and Cheng No tour Yilan, a tragic car accident rocks the county.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Tian-qing sees images of her childhood in a cryptic dream and finds an important clue that could lead her to her biological mother.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Tian-qing mulls a new career opportunity. Cheng No suspects Ms. Kuan is keeping a secret that may be connected to Tian-qing.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Ms. Kuan opens up to Cheng No about her past -- and an incident that weighs on her. Cheng No's parents disapprove of his relationship with Tian-qing.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Ms. Cai and Ah Hong give Tian-qing reasons to forgive Ms. Kuan, who prepares to make amends with her past.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Cheng No and Cheng Shan reckon with tensions over their father's plan to lay off workers at the factory. A big surprise awaits Tian-yu.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: When their van breaks down, Cheng No, Tian-qing and the dance troupe race against the clock to arrive at the festival in time.
